lead_paragraph: CULLEN--Thomas Ward, Jr.,88, of Jupiter, Florida, Westhampton Beach and formerly of Plandome, NY, passed away peacefully on February 22, 2016 surrounded by his beloved family. Born in Brooklyn, NY on October 5, 1927, son of Thomas and Marion Cullen. Beloved husband to Michele Connell Cullen for 61 years, formerly of Jersey City and Sea Girt, NJ. Cherished by his adoring family, Thomas (Elizabeth) Cullen, Mary Lou (Peter) Burns, Lisa Coleman, Suzanne (John) Donovan, Jim (Sue) Cullen, John (Lisa) Cullen, Paul (Suzanne) Cullen. Proud and devoted grandfather to 19 grandchildren and five great- grandchildren. Loving oldest brother of eight, Gene (Ginger) Cullen, Bill (Vina) Cullen, Maryanne Manning, Robert (Eileen) Cullen, Eileen (Jake) Blake, Cathleen (Dan) Pratt, Suzanne (Peter) Riebling. Predeceased by Rosemary (Perry) Griffith and William Manning. Served two years in the US Navy, graduated Villanova in 1952. Tom was a member of the New York Stock Exchange since 1957, along with his three brothers. He was a devout daily communicant. As the Cullen family leader, Tom was a compassionate, kind, humble and loving counselor to all. Family will receive friends at Fairchild Funeral Home, 1570 Northern Blvd, Manhasset, NY on Sunday, February 28th 3-7pm. Mass of Christian Burial on Monday, February 29th, 10am at St. Mary's Roman Catholic Church at 1300 Northern Blvd, Manhasset. In lieu of flowers, donations in Tom's memory may be sent to Little Flower Children and Family Services, Wading River, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CULLEN, THOMAS WARD, JR.
